Bash(powershell -Command "$response = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri ''https://exopoditic-emersyn-unblushing.ngrok-free.dev/webhook/batch-process'' -Method POST -ContentType ''application/json'' -Body ''{""items"":[{""task_type"":""text"",""payload"":{""source"":""api"",""subject"":""Simple Batch"",""content"":""Test content""}}]}'' -UseBasicParsing; Write-Host ''Status:'' $response.StatusCode; Write-Host ''Content:'' $response.Content")
